Bulletin No 116 Parker Velcon threaded-base coalescers 27th September 2018 
For the attention of all users of Parker Velcon threaded-base coalescer elements 
Background 
JIG received the attached announcement, that was disseminated by Parker Velcon through 
their network of distributors. 
As noted in the attached Parker Velcon announcement, instances have been reported of 
threaded base end caps separating from filter coalescer elements manufactured in the period 
October to November 2017. 
As noted by Parker Velcon, elements manufactured over this period used threaded base end 
caps from an alternative supplier, however Parker Velcon do not have definitive evidence of 
the root cause and are still working to understand it conclusively. 
Case for action 
Users of Parker Velcon threaded-base coalescer elements shall follow all required actions 
specified in the attached announcement by Parker Velcon. 
If JIG receives additional information, either directly from end users or from the filter 
manufacturer following the conclusion of the investigation, that warrants a different set of 
actions than what is specified in the attached announcement, JIG will provide additional 
guidance through a new JIG Bulletin.
